name: Knightfall (itch)
description:
A game with the ability to be endless with an infinite number of random dungeons, enemy's will be randomly generated in the future but as of now are pre-made.

________________________________

Controls

________________________________

WASD for movement

E to interact

Left and right mouse button for attack/abilitys

Space for special (at the moment it is defaulted to a dash)

Alt to open inventory

Ctrl Use Health Potion

________________________________

----------------------------------------

Sound Guy TotemSP/CommanderSaxon
